IDENTIFY WHICH INDIVIDUALS, INSTITUTIONS, OR ORGANIZATIONS MUST GIVE 
APPROVAL OR SUPPORT FOR USING THE WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST   
It is important to gain the public endorsement of key individuals, institutions, and 
organizations to ensure effective implementation of the Checklist. Engagement with 
different health administrative levels is especially important to ensure that they are 
aware of your process for implementing the Checklist. By
